i have a method within factory class A that does
rs.close()    (ResultSet)
stmt.close()   (PreparedStatement)

in my junit test class i want to check
that after execution of this method
rs and stmt are really closed.

is there an easy way to do this? (rs and stmt are both member 
variables of class A)

thank you!

t.
